short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the power of AI LLM to all of the website you access without the hassle of switcing tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SmartScribe brings the power of AI to any website you visit. You can generate text, replies, color palettes, translations,  get answers to your questions and more without leaving your favorite websites.

Simply enter your command in an input field and it takes care of the rest. No need to navigate to another page or switch between apps or tabs.

It also reduces your cost as you get to pay as you use instead of an upfront cost and also gives you access on demand to the services.

How To Use: 
1: Focus on any input element.
2: Enter command with prompt
3: Wait for the execution and processing
4: Hooray! Your prompt text is replaced by the response!

There also many prebuilt functions which helps you by reducing the boilerplate prompts you need to enter usually!

Functions:
1: Translate
2: Grammer
3: Ease
4: Elaborate
5: Concise
6: Text to emoji
7: Code explaination
8: Keywords
9: Summary
10: Analogy
11: Question
12: Color palletes (4 Types)

And check out the extension for more functions. (More coming in future updates)

NOTE: You need an API key to authenticate and use API.
